It’s so nice and form fitting. If you like your scrubs more on the loose end I suggest going a size up to an X-large (assuming you’re around the same height and weight as I am) I’m very satisfied!

评论概述: Exactly as in the picture and description!
评论详情: I already have a set in this style that I had bought at Scrubwagon for my LPN program and I figured I’d get another set so I had an extra. However, the smallest size that Scrubwagon had was a Medium. I’m 5’8” and I weigh 113 lbs. I usually wear a Medium in shirts and pants in regular street clothes, but these scrubs fit really big so I wear a size XS in scrubs for both the tops and pants. An XXS fits just perfectly on me but I prefer a little bit of wiggle room and also just in case of shrinkage in the washer, I went with an XS. The Royal blue is exactly as shown in the picture. I will definitely be buying more!

These are the only scrubs I wear. I love all the extra pockets, there is a place for everything. I am a nurse. I work in an inpatient setting. I am *that* co-worker who always has everything on them and jingles when they walk. Scissors, pens, markers, hemostats, you name it -- there is a place for it in these scrubs. I am 5' and the petite sizing is great for me. This top fits perfectly. For reference I am 34D 120lb. I hope Cherokee keeps making these scrubs for a long time.

评论详情: 4 stars just because it's not chest friendly. Mind you I'm not even that big chested, I'm a size 34 C and am a true Large so it surprised me that I couldn't take this off without the help of my sister. Other than that, I love the feel of it and the style. Most scrubs that I have owned are very boxy and have no shape whatsoever. This one hit right at my waist and hugged my body in a way that flattered my shape. I would say size up if your on the fence about sizes.
